answers.answer: Fruit punch is the one to choose.
It's just juice. I like the orange one I think it's tasty. Sort of like a sweet sport orange drink
I didn't think it was bad as everyone said, I did lemon lime. It was like a really really sugary kinda heavy with a sprite taste.
I had fruit punch and to me it tasted like a MUCH sweeter version of the red Gatorade

I didn't get a choice! Mine was orange and it actually wasn't bad! It tasted like a orange freezie that was melted! Just extremely sugary, It almost burns because of all the sugar! But it wasn't at all as bad as I thought
I chose fruit punch and it wasn't bad at all
I loved the orange  one. Especially  when it's cold.  It's not bad.
Orange one made me think of Gatorade or flat orange soda
Had the orange, to me it tasted like a flat orange crush soda

title: diabetes drink
